infoSection:
What is Gobar Gas?

Gobar gas is biogas produced from cattle dung and organic waste. It is a renewable energy source that supports sustainable farming and reduces environmental impact.

Process Flow

Benefits

  • Reduces dependence on fossil fuels
  • Improves soil fertility
  • Manages organic waste efficiently

Environmental Impact

Using gobar gas helps reduce greenhouse gas emissions and promotes a cleaner environment.
